question_text: Select two requirements for successful communication between devices on separate VLANs:
answer_options: Devices must share the same VLAN ID
A router or layer 3 switch must be present
Both devices must have the same MAC address
Ports must be on the same access VLAN
correct_answer: A router or layer 3 switch must be present
explanation: A router or L3 switch is required to enable communication across VLAN boundaries.
